messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] another tsuba question
messages.msgSnippet: Milt, It s Kyo-Shoami.  The kyo style design with maru bori are the key points.  The carved rim is also a Kyo-Shoami touch. The Akasaka took a lot from Kyo and
messages.messageBody:
Milt,
It's Kyo-Shoami. The kyo style design with maru bori are the key points. The carved rim is also a Kyo-Shoami touch.

The Akasaka took a lot from Kyo and Owari sukashi.

Jim



please click...........

http://tinyurl.com/dynmn

I am thinking Kyo-sukashi/may be Diagoro, while others think there's
Akasaka elements in the design.

Any opinion is welcome.

milt



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
